segment.source: 4906(S) The CrashOnAuditFail value has changed.
segment.target: 4906(S) The CrashOnAuditFail value has changed.

segment.source: (Windows 10)
segment.target: (Windows 10)

segment.source: Describes security event 4906(S) The CrashOnAuditFail value has changed.
segment.target: Describes security event 4906(S) The CrashOnAuditFail value has changed.

segment.source: 4906(S): The CrashOnAuditFail value has changed.
segment.target: 4906(S): The CrashOnAuditFail value has changed.

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows Server 2016
segment.target: Windows Server 2016

segment.source: Event Description:
segment.target: Event Description:

segment.source: This event generates every time CrashOnAuditFail audit flag value was modified.
segment.target: This event generates every time CrashOnAuditFail audit flag value was modified.

segment.source: This event is always logged regardless of the "Audit Policy Change" sub-category setting.
segment.target: This event is always logged regardless of the "Audit Policy Change" sub-category setting.

segment.source: More information about CrashOnAuditFail flag can be found here.
segment.target: More information about CrashOnAuditFail flag can be found here.

segment.source: Note For recommendations, see Security Monitoring Recommendations for this event.
segment.target: Note For recommendations, see Security Monitoring Recommendations for this event.

segment.source: Event XML:
segment.target: Event XML:

segment.source: Required Server Roles: None.
segment.target: Required Server Roles: None.

segment.source: Minimum OS Version: Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista.
segment.target: Minimum OS Version: Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista.

segment.source: Event Versions: 0.
segment.target: Event Versions: 0.

segment.source: Field Descriptions:
segment.target: Field Descriptions:

segment.source: New Value of CrashOnAuditFail Type = UInt32: contains new value of CrashOnAuditFail flag.
segment.target: New Value of CrashOnAuditFail Type = UInt32: contains new value of CrashOnAuditFail flag.

segment.source: Possible values are:
segment.target: Possible values are:

segment.source: 0 - The feature is off.
segment.target: 0 - The feature is off.

segment.source: The system does not halt, even when it cannot record events in the Security Log.
segment.target: The system does not halt, even when it cannot record events in the Security Log.

segment.source: 1 - The feature is on.
segment.target: 1 - The feature is on.

segment.source: The system halts when it cannot record an event in the Security Log.
segment.target: The system halts when it cannot record an event in the Security Log.

segment.source: 2 - The feature is on and has been triggered.
segment.target: 2 - The feature is on and has been triggered.

segment.source: The system halted because it could not record an auditable event in the Security Log.
segment.target: The system halted because it could not record an auditable event in the Security Log.

segment.source: Only members of the Administrators group can log on.
segment.target: Only members of the Administrators group can log on.

segment.source: Security Monitoring Recommendations
segment.target: Security Monitoring Recommendations

segment.source: For 4906(S): The CrashOnAuditFail value has changed.
segment.target: For 4906(S): The CrashOnAuditFail value has changed.

segment.source: Any changes of CrashOnAuditFail audit flag that are reported by this event must be monitored, and an alert should be triggered.
segment.target: Any changes of CrashOnAuditFail audit flag that are reported by this event must be monitored, and an alert should be triggered.

segment.source: If this change was not planned, investigate the reason for the change.
segment.target: If this change was not planned, investigate the reason for the change.
